legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5001_1101_010:
Curious about the strange rumor Professor Bellis
had told [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ], [Name:PlayerNickname ]
decided to go investigate.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5001_1001_010:
Alola, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
We’ve been waiting for you.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5001_1001_020:
You’re headin’ up to the peak today, right?
Professor Bellis gave us the lowdown.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5001_1001_030:
Me and Hau are goin’ with you! Personally, I’m
hopin’ that seein’ the sunrise’ll give me some
new inspiration.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5001_1001_040:
I just want to see the Pokémon all those rumors
are talking about! I wonder what it is...
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5001_1001_050:
Ready to hit the trail, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
It’ll be way more fun if we all hike up together!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5001_0401_070: All right, then! Let’s rock ’n’ roll!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5001_0402_090:
Oh, I’m SO ready! I even packed us a bunch of
malasadas in case we get hungry on the road!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5001_1001_100:
If we start to get tired, I’ll wake us up with a
sweet bass solo. Ha ha!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5001_1001_110:
C’mon, let’s go! I can’t wait to see the sunrise
and whatever Pokémon shows up with it!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5002_1001_010:
Well, howdy! You folks wouldn’t happen to be
headin’ up to the peak, wouldja?
Hopin’ to catch the sunrise?
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5002_1001_020:
We are, actually! And we’re hoping to check out
an awesome Pokémon up there, too.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5002_1001_030: Ah, so you did hear the rumors, then...
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5002_1001_040:
In that case, can I ask y’all a favor, hiker to hiker?
I’m in awful need of a Pokémon battle to take the
edge off right about now.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5002_1001_050:
See, I’ve been thinkin’ about that mysterious
Pokémon lurkin’ up there, too, and...
Well, golly, it’s got me shakin’ in my boots!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5002_1001_060:
Doesn’t sound like a bad idea to me! I wouldn’t
mind a quick battle before dawn!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5003_1001_010:
Awww, guess you folks win this time...
My Pokémon ’n’ I are feelin’ pretty tuckered
out after our li’l battle before dawn.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5003_1001_020:
I think we’re gonna have ourselves a quick break
here. Y’all are free to join us if ya like.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5003_1001_030:
What do you think, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Want to stop here and eat our malasadas
before we get back on the trail?
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5003_1001_040:
Whoa, whoa, hold up! Now’s not the time for
malasadas, you two! We haven’t got much
time left!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5003_1001_050:
The sun’s not gonna wait around for us to
have a snack. C’mon, let’s get going!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5004_1001_010:
Woo-hoo! We finally made it to the peak!
Looks like we’re just in time to see the sunrise.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5004_1001_020:
Yep! Check out the sky... It’s starting to get
brighter and brighter! The sun’s probably gonna
rise any minute now!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5004_1001_030:
That’ll check one thing off our list, but what about
the super-awesome mystery Pokémon?
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5004_1001_040:
Hmm... No sign of anything like that yet...
Wait, look! The sun’s starting to rise!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5004_1001_050:
Whoa, check it out! There’s somethin’ on top of
the rocks over there!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5004_1001_070: N-no way! What kinda Pokémon is THAT?!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5004_1001_080: Hang on! I...I think I know what that is!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_010:
It’s...it’s Solgaleo! It appeared right when the
sun started rising!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_020: Solgaleo? Have you seen it before, Hau?
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_030:
It’s a Legendary Pokémon from the Alola region.
People call it “the beast that devours the sun”!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_040:
Whoa! It doesn’t get much cooler than Solgaleo!
Check out its mane—it looks just like the sun!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_050:
Rad... It definitely seems like the Pokémon we’re
lookin’ for.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_060:
But what’s a Legendary Pokémon doin’ all the way
out here on Pasio? And...
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_070:
Where’s its Trainer? It’s gotta be part of a sync
pair, right? I don’t see anyone else around...
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_080:
What if it came here alone from someplace far
away, to devour the sun like the legends say...?
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_090:
My grandpa once told me that Solgaleo have the
power to travel to different worlds!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_100:
Huh?! Where’d those other two Pokémon come
from all of a sudden?
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_110:
Hang on—there shouldn’t be any wild Pokémon
on Pasio! They must have come with Solgaleo.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_0401_130: Whoa, you’re right! They must be friends.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_0402_150:
Maybe... They almost look like they could be
a team.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_160: Uh, maybe it’s just my imagination...
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_170:
but it looks like Solgaleo wants to battle all the
sync pairs gathered up here right now.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_180: Hah! If this Solgaleo doesn’t have a Trainer...
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_190:
I’ll take it down and form a sync pair with
it myself!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_200:
C’mon, sunshine! Let’s fight!
You’re lookin’ at your new master, right here!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_210: Whoa, Solgaleo looks like it’s ready to pounce!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_220:
You say that like it’s a bad thing! Watch this, kid.
I’ll show ya how it’s done!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_230:
Count me in! This is gonna be the most epic
battle ever!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_240:
Hold it! Legendary Pokémon or not, it’s not right
to gang up on Pokémon like that.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_250:
Haha! Are you serious? I mean, look at it—
it’s practically taunting us all!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_260: Come on, Solgaleo! It’s time to battle!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_270:
Th-that thing’s a beast... We’re no match at all
for a Legendary Pokémon that strong...
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_280:
Guess that’s why we call ’em Legendary...
Look! Solgaleo just crushed all those Trainers,
and it’s barely breakin’ a sweat.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_290:
Wahh! Why’s it looking at us?!
Do you think it wants to battle us next?
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_300:
Heh, it’s about time! I’ve been wonderin’ when
it’d finally be our turn to take the stage!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5005_1001_310:
C’mon, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Let’s show this Legendary Pokémon
how we rock ’n’ roll!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5006_1001_010:
That roar... I think that might be Solgaleo’s way
of acknowledging our victory!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5006_1001_020:
How do you feel, Solgaleo! I bet the fire in our
hearts got yours beatin’ like a drum!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5006_1001_030:
Huh. Is it just me, or does Solgaleo look a little
too cheerful for having just lost?
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5006_1001_040:
Maybe it had a ton of fun battling us, so we
made it really happy!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5006_1001_050:
That’s my theory. Solgaleo probably loves having
fun whenever it battles, just like us.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5006_1101_060:
As if in answer to Solgaleo’s valiant roar,
a cool, refreshing breeze swept across the
mountain peak with the morning sun...
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5006_1001_070:
Wow, can you feel that breeze? The sunshine’s
so nice up here, I don’t even feel tired anymore!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5006_1001_080:
Um... Am I goin’ crazy, or is Solgaleo givin’ off
an even more intense vibe now?
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5006_1001_090:
Whoa, you’re right! Maybe it got its energy back
after eating up all that sunshine!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5006_1001_100: It looks like it wants to battle again.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5006_1001_110:
That’s what I was thinkin’! Feels like it’s tryin’ to
pump us up for another round!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5006_1001_120:
Yeah, I get the feeling Solgaleo doesn’t like
to lose. It wants to prove it can beat us!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5006_1001_130:
Hehe, fine by me. You’ve got some guts, Solgaleo!
I like your style!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5006_1001_140:
If you want more where that came from,
then c’mon! Let’s battle it out till we forget
our own names!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5006_1001_150: Get ready, ’cause we’re about to blow your mind!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_010:
Phew...
How many battles is that now? I lost count...
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_020:
Not a...clue...
I’ve barely had a...moment to breathe...
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_030:
That team must be crazy. After our battle,
we were so exhausted that we could barely stand.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_040: I know, right? But what’s even crazier is...
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_050:
That Solgaleo, right? It’s duked it out with every
single sync pair here... That’s just crazy!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_060: It looks like it might finally be satisfied.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_070:
Hehe... Think our poisonous riffs satisfied its
thirst for battle?
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_080:
I’ve been jammin’ out so hard, I forgot to watch
the rest of the sunrise. Guess that means it was
worth it!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_090: Huh, now that you mention it, I think I forgot, too.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_100:
But the Pokémon that devours the sun arrived
right along with it, right? So it’s kind of like we
got to see both!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_110: Haha, I guess it’s true when you put it that way!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_120:
Man, nothin’ beats gettin’ to have such a rad
session with Solgaleo, though! Kinda feels
auspicious, like Professor Bellis was sayin’!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_130:
Speakin’ of which, we should probably start
headin’ back soon, now that the sun’s up...
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_140: Catch ya later, Solgaleo. Stay cool.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_150: Alola! Hope we can battle again sometime!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_160:
Hey, wait a sec... Is it just me, or is Solgaleo
followin’ us?
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_170:
Uhh...nope. It’s definitely not just you...
It looks like it’s...
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_180:
Haha! I thought so! [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
I think Solgaleo wants to be your partner!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_200:
I guess I’d be cool with you and Solgaleo
forming a sync pair.
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_210:
Yo, your battle skills were top-notch earlier!
If anyone deserves to team up with Solgaleo,
it’s you, kid!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_220:
You heard ’em. So, what do you say,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_0401_240: Haha! I’m guessing that means it’s happy!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_0302_250: Guess I’ve got a new best friend!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_0402_260:
You bet you do! Haha! You and Solgaleo are
gonna make an awesome sync pair!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_270:
Woo-hoo! Now we’ll get to hang out with
Solgaleo whenever we want!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5007_1001_280:
Oh man! I hadn’t even thought of that! Hope we
get to battle again sometime soon, Solgaleo!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5301_1001_010:
Huh? Did those goons just teleport another sync
pair to Pasio? I guess I should go welcome
whoever it is...
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5301_1001_020:
Whoa... Uhh, OK. Wow. Is that Pokémon what I
think it is? Uhh, Team Break definitely upped their
game this time!
legend_event_pm0873_00_sun/5301_1001_030:
M-maybe this’ll be a good thing... More for
people to celebrate, right? I mean, as long as
it’ll help us stir up some excitement, right?
